title: MC begins to rise when MP begins to fall

content.question: The graph above shows the marginal product (MP) and the average product (AP) of labor for a firm that uses labor as the only variable input and hires its labor in a perfectly competitive market. At which quantity of labor does marginal cost change from decreasing to increasing?

unit.text: 3: Production, Cost, and the Perfect Competition Model
